verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w With|strong="H1732"\w* \w stringed|strong="H5058"\w* \w instruments|strong="H5058"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Answer me when I call, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness! You \w have|strong="H1732"\w* relieved \w my|strong="H1732"\w* distress; show me grace \w and|strong="H1732"\w* hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w How|strong="H8085"\w* \w long|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w*, \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* honor \w be|strong="H2603"\w* maligned? \w How|strong="H8085"\w* \w long|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* love vanity \w and|strong="H6030"\w* seek \w after|strong="H7121"\w* lies? Selah

Know \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w set|strong="H1245"\w* apart \w the|strong="H5704"\w* godly \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w Himself|strong="H1245"\w*; \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* hears \w when|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* call \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Him|strong="H1245"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* angry, \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* sin; \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* bed, search \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w*. Selah

Offer \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* righteous \w and|strong="H3824"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Many ask, “\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* can show us \w the|strong="H3068"\w* good?” Shine \w the|strong="H3068"\w* light \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* face upon us, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* filled \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* grain \w and|strong="H3068"\w* new wine \w abound|strong="H7227"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1715"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H5414"\w* peace, \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* alone, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H5414"\w* safety.
